body: In retrospect, Hot tails 2 might have been the very first futa on futa doujin I read - For that, I thank it. Part of the appeal of futa on futa for me lies in the malleable dynamic the futas share. In one page, the submissive futa could be the one getting topped. In another page, the reverse could be true. Futa on futa just lends itself to an array of possibilities untouched by other genres (except for josou seme and male on futa/futa on male), which is why it's a shame that there is so little of it. Above are the codes for doujins where the futas fuck each other. (Or have a similar dynamic)

Day 71 - 1771*
I really hate this art. Also, here it is the second chapter. I just hope that it only has one or two more at maximum.
1/10.
